name: SouthGate Protection CIC
description: SouthGate Protection CIC provides visible professional patrols across Croydon, engaging with residents and the community to prevent harm, respond when needed, and create a safer, more connected neighbourhood for everyone.

department.name: Partnerships
department.description: Collaborates with local organizations to enhance community safety and support initiatives like knife crime prevention.

member.name: Faron Paul
member.description: Partnered during the Notting Hill Carnival to assist medics and support weapon collections, resulting in 14 weapon surrenders over the carnival weekend.
